Title: Information system strategic planning in PT XYZ
Source title: Proceedings - 2017 International Conference on Applied Computer and Communication Technologies, ComCom 2017
Affiliations: Graduate Program on Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Christianti, N., Graduate Program on Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia; Harisno, Graduate Program on Information System Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11530, Indonesia
Abstract: This research aims to analyze the internal and external environment of business and Information Systems/Information Technology (IS/IT), identify the current and future application portfolio, as well as create an Information System Strategic Planning (ISSP) to reach the vision and mission of PT XYZ. Data are obtained from interviews, questionnaires, and analysis of company documents. The method used in this research is descriptive by using the ISSP framework from Ward and Peppard, and the results of strategic recommendations are documented by using the Enterprise Architecture framework from Scott A. Bernard. The result of this research is a blueprint related to IS business strategy, IS/IT management strategy, and IT strategy that may help PT XYZ achieve the strategic goals. From those results, it can be concluded that there are some proposed applications, security tools, knowledge and skill profile, and recommendations of IS/IT infrastructure that can be applied at the company. © 2017 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Application portfolio; Information system strategic planning; IS business strategy; IS/IT management strategy; IT strategy; Ward and peppard framework
Index Keywords: Information systems; Information use; Planning; Strategic planning; Surveys; Business strategy; Enterprise Architecture; External environments; Future applications; Information systems/information technologies; IT strategies; Management strategies; Ward and peppard framework; Information management
